sn55.14:1.1: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things has gone beyond all fear of being reborn in a bad place.
sn55.14:1.3: It’s when a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha …
sn55.14:1.7: And they have the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.
sn55.14:1.8: A noble disciple who has these four things has gone beyond all fear of being reborn in a bad place.”
